title: Exclusive interview: Christophe Lamaison reveals how France's miraculous 1999 World Cup comeback against New Zealand changed his life
text:
The waistline is a little fuller these days, the polo shirt a little snugger, the hair a little greyer. But in all other respects Christophe Lamaison looks exactly as he did 20 years ago. The same flashing smile, the same Gallic style. He parks his scooter on the pavement and saunters over in a pair of bright red chinos.

“Twenty years," says the hero of France’s 1999 World Cup campaign, shaking his head. “I don’t know where the time has gone.”
